title: The Devil's Right Hand
description: With his life already at rock bottom as his estranged wife, Lisa, threatens to take his daughter away from him, a chance discovery thrusts Martin into a waking nightmare as he is forced to decide whose lives are worth less than the soul of his beloved child.An antique gun, cursed by evil, controls his destiny as he stalks the city streets, searching for victims. But choosing a victim is not as easy as it Who is he - to be judge, jury and executioner? Who is he - to decide who will not be missed or grieved? author: Jason Kott
